Objective

Introduction to Recurrent Neural Networks, Large Language Models and GPT text models.

This lesson has no direct lecturing, but will focus on hands-on exercises, where we all train text-processing models. So, be prepared for chipping in with comments and help to you co-students.

Bring Your own cup, if you need the coffee or tea I server!

(Notice that the lesson is 'work-in progress'; links etc. not finalized yet!)

Content

  • Using the ECE GPU Cluster.
  • Introduction to RNNs,
    • and hands-on exercise Text Generation.
  • Introduction to GPTs
    • and hands-on exercise nanoGPT.

Preparation before the lesson

  • At least, skim the literature!
